text: ohuma utpādanayan (pera nidasuṇak nomætivama ārambhayēdī) nirmāṇaya karannēya. ohuma (ēvā maraṇayaṭa pat vū pasuda, paṇa dī) ēvā punarutthānaya karannēya. meya ohuṭa itāmat pahasuya. ahashida, bhūmiyehida itāmat usas upamāvan ohuṭama ayitiya. ohu (siyallaṭa) balasampannayeku hā gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
